buy this
ItemTooltips.vladmir: your teammates picked 4 carries but their idiocy didn't stop there, they picked all melee, THEN WHINE ABOUT THEIR LANING PHASE BEING SHITTY? Cheer those clowns up with free lifesteals. If they flame you for buying vlads then buy sentries (you know what i mean)

buy this
